page.title: 17TREES
page.content:
On the 11 June 1985,Class 2W of the Hermitage Middle School planted a small Wellingtonia tree.We were with Mr Humphrey of the "Men of Trees."This is a Conservation Charity whose Patron is H.R.H. The Prince of Wales.The tree is in Sutton Avenue and near another Giant Sequoia which is over 1OO years old and used to stand in the old Hermitage House grounds.That one is approximately 16.5 metres tall and its girth is 8.8 metres at ground level. The baby tree is 3 years old and 46 centimetres tall.
BY RUTH BENNETT Age 10
